<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rippling Spin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2983) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 202 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Reflective Ripple Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2980)

**Trigger**
You are hit by a physical melee attack by an attacker you can see that's in reach.

**Requirements**
You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

</column>

---

After the triggering attack is done, Step. You must end this Step within the attacker's reach. Then, you can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the attacker.
name: Rippling Spin
